name: TiliruTorana
0:
”Alexa, open kannada podcast”
”Alexa, ask kannada podcast to play”
”Alexa, ask kannada podcast to begin podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kannada podcast
des:
This is a Podcast of the weekly column by Srivatsa Joshi in the kannada daily "Vishwa Vaani" . Joshi lives in Washington DC area and is a prolific writer in kannada. 

This is a weekly podcast updated every Sunday. 

use example phrases to get started with the skill

You could control your podcast by telling Alexa to
'pause' to pause the Podcast and 'resume' to resume it
'stop/cancel' to stop the podcast
'startover' to go to the beginning of the podcast
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
